articles.title: French President Macron heads to Algeria to relaunch ties
articles.description: Relations soured last year after Emmanuel Macron’s comments on Algeria’s history led to a diplomatic rift.
articles.content:

articles.title: Guterres says UN working to get Russian food to markets
articles.description: The UN secretary-general says obstacles must be removed to Russian food exports, which are not sanctioned.
articles.content:

articles.description: Three firefighters, two paramedics and two journalists were among those killed on a highway in southern Turkey.
